pkgmetadata.longdescription: # dcodedWelcome to dcoded - the package designed to do everything!## InstallationLinux / macOS (python3):``` zshpython3 -m pip install dcoded```Linux / macOS (python2):``` zshpython -m pip install dcoded```Windows:``` zshpy -m pip install dcoded```## ModulesBelow are listed the modules in dcoded:* dcoded.io.file## Docs[dcode documentation](https://github.com/dylanopen/dcoded/blob/main/docs.md)
